backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and farmer submissions with access-control checks and in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, affected files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto‑generated summaries of key frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining global typography, spacing, and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling login session state and rendering LoginPage or MainApp inside providers.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Empty placeholder file for analytics component.
frontend/src/components/FarmerForm.tsx: React form for collecting farmer data with validation, dependent selects, submission to Google Sheets, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying mobile‑friendly and Google Sheets badges plus a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with branding, settings and logout buttons, and displays login ID and submission count.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/RecordsList.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/SearchableSelect: Provides a searchable dropdown select using a popover and command list, allowing option filtering and selection.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Displays a dialog for viewing the locked Google Apps Script URL and testing connectivity with status feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity loading via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks to submit farmer data to Google Sheets and to fetch submission counts with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom typography and utility rules.
frontend/src/lib/constants.ts: Defines an array of Maharashtra districts and a detailed mapping of each district to its talukas.
frontend/src/lib/googleAppsScript.ts: Exports the single configured URL for the Google Apps Script web app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login form UI with validation, storing the user's name in sessionStorage and triggering onLogin.
frontend/src/pages/MainApp.tsx: Displays the main app structure with header, farmer form, and footer using provided login and user data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, features, UI improvement goals, and pending feature requests.
